hero.name: Aboubakar Sidik Faha
hero.title: Digital Consultant & Tech Entrepreneur
hero.description: Transform your digital vision into reality with innovative and custom-made solutions. Expertise in web development, digital strategy, and artificial intelligence.

about.title: About
about.heading: Digital Innovator & Solutions Architect
about.description1: Passionate about technological innovation, I transform complex challenges into elegant and high-performing solutions. My approach combines cutting-edge technical expertise with strategic vision to create exceptional digital experiences.
about.description2: Specialized in modern web application development, artificial intelligence, and digital transformation, I support startups and established companies in their technological evolution.

services.title: Premium Services
services.subtitle: Custom technological solutions to propel your business

webDev.title: Web Development
webDev.description: Modern and high-performing web applications using the latest technologies: React, Vue.js, Node.js, and cloud-native architectures.

ai.title: Artificial Intelligence
ai.description: Integration of AI and Machine Learning solutions to automate and optimize your business processes with measurable results.

strategy.title: Digital Strategy
strategy.description: Complete strategic support to transform your digital presence and maximize your ROI with proven methods.

mobile.title: Mobile Applications
mobile.description: Development of native and cross-platform mobile applications offering a smooth and intuitive user experience.

projects.title: Completed Projects
projects.subtitle: A selection of my most innovative achievements

testimonials.title: Testimonials
testimonials.subtitle: What those who worked with me have to say

osaigbovo.name: Osaigbovo Idada
osaigbovo.text: His ability to translate complex requirements into smooth, user-friendly interfaces was truly impressive. He has a keen eye for design, a deep understanding of frontend technologies, and a problem-solving mindset that made our collaboration seamless.

david.name: David Ben Otto
david.role: AWS Cloud Engineer at KodeCloud Inc
david.text: I've worked with Aboubakar in a very innovative project around connected vehicles. On the technical side, Aboubakar was just a guru: we worked hours on CI-CD pipelines with GitHub Actions and integration of microservices using API.

bruce.name: Kwiringira Bruce Hervé
bruce.text: It's rare that you come across a standout talent like Aboubakar. Incredibly multi talented, a fully fledged full stack engineer capable of coding in multiple JavaScript frameworks and a fully fledged DevOps engineer.

jim.name: Jim Carlson Ngnintedem
jim.role: DevOps Engineer | Terraform & Agile Certified | Scrum Master
jim.text: Curious, responsible, highly involved and naturally endowed with a critical and analytical mind, Sidik Aboubakar is a driving force who loves challenges and investing in new projects.

hermann.name: Jean-François Hermann N'Guessan Angora
hermann.text: I've known people who know their field, but Sidik, in addition to being super talented in DevOps, knows so many other areas including mobile. I love collaborating with him, he's helpful and hardworking.

cabraule.name: Cabraule Ketchanga
cabraule.text: He is one of the most dynamic people I know in development. His sense of commitment and responsibility means he is always seen as the one who should lead the others.
